defineservice.name: metratech.com/BulkUnitRatesPT
defineservice.description: Parameter table for configuring BulkUnitRates Decision attributes

ptype.description: Tier start for the range of number of units covered by the bulk unit rates decision.
Tier end for the range of number of units covered by the bulk unit rates decision.
Override rate for the charge if the number of units in the charge falls within the StartOfUnitRange to EndOfUnitRange range of units.
